title: Bug 69459Hiding of Instance Methods by static methods
description: Bug 69459Hiding of Instance Methods by static methods Is thisbehaviour desired ?
OB: Using Introduction it is possible to hide instance methods by static methods.Example:class Super {public void m(){};}class Sub {}aspect A {public static void Sub.m(){}}Acccording to the Java Language Specification this is not allowed. ?It is also possible to override static methods by instance methods, wich causesa compile time error in java.
